author: pipermerriam
content:
The `Client` and `Network` in the python POC (aka DDHT) are the main low level and high level interfaces:

- https://github.com/ethereum/ddht/blob/master/ddht/v5_1/alexandria/client.py
- https://github.com/ethereum/ddht/blob/master/ddht/v5_1/alexandria/network.py

And here's where it implements the handling of `FindNodes`: https://github.com/ethereum/ddht/blob/master/ddht/v5_1/alexandria/network.py#L334-L356

author: pipermerriam
content: sorry for dropping out there at the end,  thanks everyone for their updates
